metadata.name: Disable Or Stop Services
metadata.comment: Detects the usage of utilities such as 'systemctl', 'service'...etc to stop or disable tools and services

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/service')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/systemctl')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/chkconfig'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('stop')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('disable'))))

output.summary: Detects the usage of utilities such as 'systemctl', 'service'...etc to stop or disable tools and services

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities Reference: https://www.trendmicro.com/pl_pl/research/20/i/the-evolution-of-malicious-shell-scripts.html
